summary: A mystical chain formed from the essence of the Lake Trio (Uxie, Mesprit, Azelf). It is used to summon and control the legendary Pokémon Dialga, Palkia, or Giratina in the Sinnoh region games. It is not obtainable or usable by players in standard competitive battles.
typical_users: Not applicable for competitive play; used only by in-game antagonists (e.g., Team Galactic) for story progression.
